name: American Crash
description:
You have crashed on an unknown planet and your spaceship is not operatable. Many of the spaceship parts were spreading across the planet. To repair your spaceship, you'll need to collect all the parts to leave the planet and return home.

Credits:

Game Developer: Rob Avery

Music:

Space Funk by Organism

America, Fuck Yeah by team america

Font: Mandalore by Iconian Fonts
